speaker: You
dialog: Hello, I am your new intern baker.

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: Hello! you fricking donkey, I'm Gorgon Baguette, or call me master of baking.

speaker: You
dialog: is it easy to bake a cake?

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: NO! No! No! I think It is super easy for me to bake a cake. But it is not easy for you. My grandpa could easily bake one! So, can you do it?!

speaker: You
dialog: Sounds harsh but I can try! I am a fighter, born ready to bake!

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: First step: you will receive a recipe from me and you must gather the ingredients from the kitchen so you don't drop them.

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: Make sure to walk in front of the fridge/shelves before you grab (SPACEBAR) the ingredients.

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: First step sounds easy right? but the second step is hard because you will need to toss things into the bowl (Drag and Drop). The bakery shop has anti-gravity technology so the ingredients will be flying.

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: Next, you will need to mix the ingredients. Start mashing those goodies together! (mash arrow keys in order left up right down)

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: Next process is really important. You must master the art of temperature control. Press (SPACEBAR) once the blue hits the green.

speaker: You
dialog: You Pondering: master is so over-dramatic...

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: Lastly, the last step will be designing the cake by adding decorations. You will be able to put the flower, candy, chocolate or anything that makes the cake perfect!

speaker: You
dialog: Yes! Sir! Yes! Sir! Yes! Sir!

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: Don't always say Yes, You stupid! If the Cake is disgusting, youâ€™ll get arrested. Make sure to try to complete this in 60 minutes! (60 seconds in game)

speaker: Gorgon
dialog: Ready?! Press S and get to work, now!
